channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- IBM System x 3550 M3
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- IBM System x 3550 M3

item.title: CVE-2021-3723|2024-08-03T17:01:07.696Z -- ibm -- ibm%20system%20x%203550%20m3
item.description: A command injection vulnerability was reported in the Integrated Management Module (IMM) of legacy IBM System x 3550 M3 and IBM System x 3650 M3 servers that could allow the execution of operating system commands over an authenticated SSH or Telnet session.
